text: Should your whole family receive a #COVID19 vaccine when the time comes? Currently, emergency use of the Pfizer-BioNTech #vaccine is approved for people 16 & older and the Moderna vaccine for those 18 & older. Stay up-to-date here: https://t.co/yEg4Ebq5fX  #NewYearNewVaccine https://t.co/YKAawh0dYr
